definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Slurpees are most popular with young Americans.
sentences.chinese: “思樂冰”在美國年輕人中尤其受歡迎。

sentences.english: Slurpees can be found in all types of flavors, but the most common are cherry and blueberry.
sentences.chinese: “思樂冰”口味多樣，但最常見的是櫻桃和藍莓口味。
